headline.main: Great Lakes Mayors Warn Against Cut to Ecological Initiative
headline.print_headline: Great Lakes Mayors Warn Against Cut to Ecological Initiative

lead_paragraph: A group representing Great Lakes region mayors in the U.S. and Canada is sounding the alarm against potentially drastic cuts to an ecological recovery initiative for the Great Lakes.
snippet: A group representing Great Lakes region mayors in the U.S. and Canada is sounding the alarm against potentially drastic cuts to an ecological recovery initiative for the Great Lakes....
